subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
Olympic Games (2012)
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: Marion Bartoli, France’s No. 1 women’s player, has kept her father as her coach despite pressure to change, and that decision has now cost her, at 27, a spot at the London Olympics.
snippet: Marion Bartoli, France’s No. 1 women’s player, has kept her father as her coach despite pressure to change, and that decision has now cost her, at 27, a spot at the London Olympics.
